patthana13.1:0.2_0: Living in the teaching, they are included in the discourses and found.

patthana13.1:1.1_0: Homage to that Blessed One, the perfected one, the fully awakened Buddha!
patthana13.1:10.1_0: Those less than twenty, twenty, thirty, forty, or fifty.
patthana13.1:10.1_2: who has not reached twenty years of age.
patthana13.1:11.1_0: So the unskillful is not the teaching.
patthana13.1:11.1_1: So it doesn’t give rise to thought: for the sake of speaking ill will.
patthana13.1:11.1_2: Unskillful thoughts don’t arise because of unskillful qualities or for the sake of dark livelihood.
patthana13.1:12.1_0: There is no declared by the unskillful.
patthana13.1:12.1_1: There is no declared by the teaching that is not skillful.
patthana13.1:12.1_2: Nor do they arise because of unkilled in the unskilled in mind.
patthana13.1:13.1_0: Mind is not the skillful. On the support is a condition for the unskillful.
patthana13.1:13.1_1: Mind consciousness is not skilled in the supports. The supports aren’t a condition for the arising of thought.
patthana13.1:13.1_2: Unskillful thoughts, skilled in the teaching, and skilled in the supports.
patthana13.1:14.1_0: Unskillful thoughts are not skilled in the supports.
patthana13.1:14.1_1: Unskillfulness is not unskillful. On the support is a condition for the arising of unskillful.
patthana13.1:14.1_2: Unskillful thoughts, unskillful qualities don’t arise, or conditioned by which that supports arise.
patthana13.1:15.1_0: For the sake of the reason, not for the sake of letting go of the group, nor for twenty years old is unable to find one person.
patthana13.1:15.1_1: He should not spent the new actions.
patthana13.1:15.1_3: He should not give up three paths ...
patthana13.1:16.1_0: (Expand in detail as in the previous discourse.)
patthana13.1:16.1_1: He should not spent the following in the same room as the following.
patthana13.1:16.1_2: If they provide a reason for the six reasons ...
patthana13.1:17.1_0: skilled in the teachings of the skillful is not the cause or reason for the teaching.
patthana13.1:17.1_1: skilled in the teaching of the skillful is not the cause or reason for something.
patthana13.1:17.1_2: and the cause of what is the reason for this.
patthana13.1:17.1_3: skilled in the teaching of the skillful and what is for the sake of listening to the teaching.
patthana13.1:17.1_4: skilled in the teaching of the skillful and what is cause for the reason for this.
patthana13.1:18.1_0: skilled in the teaching of the unskillful is not skilled in the teaching.
patthana13.1:18.1_1: skilled in the teaching for the skilled in terms of the teaching.
patthana13.1:18.1_2: ‘This is not the cause or condition for the teachings.
patthana13.1:18.1_3: ‘This is not the case, nor what is the cause for the people to hear the Teaching.
patthana13.1:18.1_4: Not skilled in the teachings, skilled in the meaning, and skilled in the teaching.
patthana13.1:19.1_1: You don’t understand the teachings of the unskillful.
patthana13.1:19.1_2: Undeclared; it’s not the cause or reason for the teaching.
patthana13.1:2.1_0: Disciples doesn’t give rise to the unskillful phenomena that arise from the skillful.
patthana13.1:2.1_1: Disciples doesn’t give rise to three unskillful phenomena. Eye consciousness arises dependent on the aggregates and three elements. ...
patthana13.1:2.1_2: Disciples arise dependent on the skillful.
patthana13.1:2.1_3: Mind consciousness is not skilled in the three skillful things, causes and reasons.
patthana13.1:2.1_4: causes unskillful qualities to be skillful and unskillful phenomena don’t arise because of the skillful mind.
patthana13.1:20.1_0: (This is not the Teaching’, what is the meaning of what is the Teaching as the Teaching.)
patthana13.1:21.1_0: ‘This is not the teaching for the unskillful.
patthana13.1:22.1_0: (This should be expanded as in Bamboo Grove.)
patthana13.1:23.1_0: The eighteen bases for psychic power, the eighteen bases for psychic power, are the sixteenth year, the thirty-four grounds, and ninety years old. In the past you, the twelve years old, and the ninety-five years old.
patthana13.1:23.1_1: There’s twelve hundred carves in each road. ...
patthana13.1:23.1_3: (This should be expanded in detail as in the chapter.)
patthana13.1:3.1_0: The unskillful is not skilled in the aggregates, skilled in the aggregates, and a cause of the mind.
patthana13.1:3.1_1: Unskillfulness is a cause of the unskillful phenomena to arise by one: three unskillful phenomena, or three.
patthana13.1:3.1_2: Unskillfulness arises dependent on the unskillful is a cause and reason.
patthana13.1:3.1_3: Unskilled in the unskillful and the phenomena that arise from causes and reason.
patthana13.1:3.1_4: Unskillful thoughts, unskillful qualities arise and causes causes.
patthana13.1:4.1_0: An undetermined quality arises dependent on a cause of the Buddha to declare that it arises conditioned by mind, and one that arises conditioned by the mind.
patthana13.1:4.1_3: The two primary elements depend on form, feeling, perception, choices, and consciousness.
patthana13.1:4.1_4: An undetermined person doesn’t have any result in the past. ...”
patthana13.1:4.1_7: An unkilled indeterminately, unskillful qualities, or results in skillful qualities.
patthana13.1:5.1_0: E skilled in the undeclared points. Mind consciousness arises dependent on the mind and the many aggregates.
patthana13.1:5.1_1: Endowed with the unskilled in the unskilled teaching.
patthana13.1:5.1_2: Endowed with the unskilled in the unskilled in the variety of unskillful phenomena, and the causes and reasons.
patthana13.1:6.1_0: No skilled in the undeclared points for the unskillful.
patthana13.1:6.1_1: Endowed with the unskilled in the unskilled teaching.
patthana13.1:6.1_2: No skilled in the unkilled in the undeclared points, and skilled in causes.
patthana13.1:6.1_3: (This should be expanded as in the same way.)
patthana13.1:7.1_0: Mind consciousness is not skilled in the supports. The supports are a condition for the arising of thought.
patthana13.1:7.1_1: Disciples doesn’t give rise to what is skillful. On the support is a condition for the arising of thought.
patthana13.1:7.1_2: Mindful, thoughts don’t arise because of the skillful. And the supports arise because of the skillful.
patthana13.1:8.1_0: Unskillfulness is not skilled, and the supports that arise from the unskillful.
patthana13.1:8.1_1: So the unskillful is not the supported by thoughts, nor is a condition for the support.
patthana13.1:8.1_2: Unskilled in the unskillful and unskillful, or cruel phenomena arise.
patthana13.1:9.1_0: Nose consciousness arises dependent on the side of the unskillful.
patthana13.1:9.1_1: Nose consciousness arises dependent on the support.
patthana13.1:9.1_2: An undetermined teaching, skilled in the supports, and skilled in the supports.
